CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Partly inadmissible;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award

CARDINAL . The Russian Law on Enforcement Proceedings ( no . CARDINAL of DATE ) designates the court bailiffs ' service as the authority charged with enforcement of court decisions ( LAW ) .
